title: "Singed now laughs whenever he flings an enemy"
body: This changes nothing he laughs 24/7 anyway.

replies.body:
ill "laugh" when belkin stops ruining lives, turns out they bought this model of modem and screw it up so hard, can i ever get a bloody modem that works. iiNet, nope breaks, then comes the hell spree of dlink, low range bigpond, and now belkin has bought this modem and its no longer anygood, slow as anything now, cant they ruin the design after i buy it.

And to top it off, my antivirus expired yesterday, and i ended up contracting 5 trojans from who knows where, and to top that off, this modem is way to slow to actually download a package, and my diskdrive broke, so i cant use an anti virus, i have to manually remove them, the computer company wouldn't repair my drive, after bloody 3 checkups, even told them it didn't work. 

All in all, belkin ruins lives, hunt them down.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=doLPTZEV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-08T05:11:28.514+0000)
>

> And to top it off, my antivirus expired yesterday, and i ended up contracting 5 trojans from who knows where, and to top that off, this modem is way to slow to actually download a package, and my diskdrive broke, so i cant use an anti virus, i have to manually remove them, the computer company wouldn't repair my drive, after bloody 3 checkups, even told them it didn't work. 
> 
> All in all, belkin ruins lives, hunt them down.

Lmao we have problems with our belkin almost all the time. I think it overheats from the constant usage and after 2-3 years it just fails to connect to our own network, which I had to find out the hard way. We switched it up to the newly upgraded Belkin, which to be fair wasn't much better. It's starting to act up again *sigh*.

Anyways back to the Singed changes, he's definitely going to be a menace top lane, but at least Riot didnt buff Teemo. Of wait, the Ap changes buffs Teemo as well. Great. RITO PLZ
Just so people chase him more and realise better go home when they have 100 hp
